name: Super Mario Odyssey
description: Super Mario Odyssey is a 3D platformer game developed by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch. It follows Mario on a globe-trotting adventure to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, who plans to marry her. Mario is joined by Cappy, a sentient hat, which allows him to possess enemies and objects to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles. The game features expansive, vibrant open-world environments, with each kingdom offering unique challenges and collectibles, making it a highly praised and creative entry in the Mario series.

name: Harvestella
description: Harvestella is an action-RPG developed by Square Enix that blends farming simulation with adventure and combat elements. Set in a world where the four seasons are governed by the mystical 'Seasons,' the game follows a protagonist who navigates through a land threatened by an enigmatic season known as 'Quietus.' Players grow crops, tend to a farm, and build relationships with various characters, all while exploring dungeons and battling enemies. The game combines life-simulation mechanics with an engaging storyline and real-time combat.

name: Story of Seasons: Friends of Mineral Town
description: Story of Seasons: Friends of Mineral Town is a farming simulation game where players take on the role of a young farmer who returns to the countryside to revitalize their late grandfather's farm. The game combines farming, animal husbandry, and building relationships with the townsfolk. Players can grow crops, raise animals, mine, fish, and participate in festivals. As they progress, they can develop friendships and even pursue marriage with one of the town's bachelors or bachelorettes. It’s a relaxing and nostalgic game, offering a charming rural life experience.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom
description: The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom features Zelda as she discovers a mysterious sword that grants her the ability to transform into a powerful swordfighter. Players explore Hyrule, battling monsters and solving puzzles while navigating sinister rifts that have appeared across the kingdom. Zelda utilizes a magical staff to summon 'echoes', which are imitations of objects and creatures, allowing her to interact with the environment in unique ways.

name: Pokemon Violet
description: Pokémon Violet is one of the two main titles in the ninth generation of the Pokémon series, released alongside Pokémon Scarlet. Set in the Paldea region, which is inspired by the Iberian Peninsula, the game introduces an open-world experience where players can explore diverse landscapes, from sprawling cities to lush countryside.

name: OCtopath Traveller
description: Octopath Traveler is a role-playing game developed by Square Enix and released in 2018. Set in the beautifully crafted world of Orsterra, the game features a unique 'HD-2D' art style that combines retro pixel art with modern visual effects, creating a visually stunning experience.

name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
description: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe is a racing game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch, released in April 2017. It is an enhanced version of the original Mario Kart 8, which debuted on the Wii U in 2014.

name: Animal Crossing new Horizons
description: Animal Crossing: New Horizons is a life simulation game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch, released in March 2020. It is the fifth main installment in the Animal Crossing series and allows players to create and manage their own deserted island paradise.
